description: The secret society that controls Blue Cosmos. Logos is made up of a handful of powerful industrialists and defense contractors who see war as a business, and manipulate world events to profit from the misery it creates. Using agents such as Blue Cosmos and Phantom Pain, Logos works from behind the scenes to create conflict and fan the flames of war. Lord Djibril, the current leader of Blue Cosmos, is among the members of this organization.
name: Logos
